name: Unparalleled Beauty, Ichika Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room."

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Irrepressible Feelings, Ichika Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Bold Answer-Checking Method" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Quintuplets》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of this turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, choose up to X cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, your opponent shuffles their deck, and you deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of other 《Quintuplets》 characters you have." (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: How about it? Was it me?

name: Relaxing in a Yukata, Ichika Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another character with "Ichika(一花)" in its card name, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character with "Ichika(一花)" in its card name in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: Please make sure to take care of everyone. This is a crucial moment.

name: Flowers of Gratitude, Yotsuba Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of "Reason For Transferring Schools" or characters with "Yotsuba(四葉)" in their card names among those cards ×1000.

name: The Quintuplets After 5 Years, Ichika Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your hand. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

name: The Quintuplets After 5 Years, Yotsuba Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if your hand has 4 or more cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: The Quintuplets After 5 Years, Nino Nakano
ability: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may choose 1 《Quintuplets》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: The Quintuplets After 5 Years, Itsuki Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards in your memory except those cards into your waiting room."
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if your hand has 5 or more cards, choose 1 of your 《Quintuplets》 character, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: The Quintuplets After 5 Years, Miku Nakano
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Quintuplets》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Lifelong Bond, Ichika & Nino & Miku & Yotsuba & Itsuki
ability: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements.
【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Bouquet For You, Ichika & Nino & Miku & Yotsuba & Itsuki
ability: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 0 or lower character, put it in any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
